TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FromBase64Transform extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform
type FromBase64Transform = class interface ICryptoTransform interface IDisposable

span.span: Converts a from base 64.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Base 64 内容传输编码表示任意位序列中窗体的不是人类可读。Base 64 Content-Transfer-Encoding represents arbitrary bit sequences in a form that is not human readable. ## Examples 下面的示例将解码为一个文本输出文件 base 64 编码文件。The following example decodes a base 64-encoded file to an output text file. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform Example/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform Example/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.FromBase64Transform Example/VB/class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在当前实现中，只能有一个块可以转换一次，因此此属性始终为`false`。In the current implementation, only one block can be transformed at a time, so this property is always `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是对的简单调用。This method is a simple call to . 调用`Dispose`允许使用的资源重新分配用于其他目的。Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息`Dispose`，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法释放参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the disposing parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 将释放设置为 `Dispose`，调用 `false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with disposing set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请小心不要引用在早期调用之前释放对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由公共 dispose （） 方法和 Finalize 方法调用此方法。This method is called by the public Dispose() method and the Finalize method. Dispose （） 调用受保护的 dispose （boolean） 方法释放参数设置为 true。Dispose() invokes the protected Dispose(Boolean) method with the disposing parameter set to true. 完成调用 Dispose disposing 设置为 false。Finalize invokes Dispose with disposing set to false. 当处置参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the disposing parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 dispose （） 方法。This method invokes the Dispose() method of each referenced object. **继承者说明：****Notes to Inheritors:** Dispose 可以由其他对象调用多次。Dispose can be called multiple times by other objects. 当重写 dispose （boolean），注意不要引用已经释放的早期调用到 Dispose 中的对象。When overriding Dispose(Boolean), be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to Dispose. 有关如何实现 dispose （boolean） 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information about how to implement Dispose(Boolean), see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). 有关 Dispose 和 Finalize 的详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v%3dvs.100))。For more information about Dispose and Finalize, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v%3dvs.100)).

summary.span: 将输入字节数组的指定区域从 Base 64 进行转换，并将结果复制到输出字节数组的指定区域。

span.span: Converts the specified region of the input byte array from base 64 and copies the result to the specified region of the output byte array.
The number of bytes written.
